review: Has a great feel with the controller. Set up was pretty easy and shows are wonderful for the kids.
author: Ernest hatcher

review: To many free trial not enough movie channels.
author: Tee Mack

review: Works great!!!! Need good wifi though not simple or standard. Has to be his speed, best plan. But nothing to do with fire stick, fire stick is awesome convenient and I am extremely happy
author: jacob jauregui

review: I would have given this 5 stars, but it doesn't fit in smaller TV's
author: Stacia

review: Love it, now can catch on shows in the den
author: Jon Bourne

review: While the interface is pretty good and the technical specs are awesome, I had ongoing trouble with buffering on my WIFI - with 50MBs download speed! Switched to wired Fire TV and now enjoy the best image quality on Netflix and Amazon Prime.
author: Matt "Matt"

review: There's plenty of room for improvement IMHO with the device ... requirement of extra charging cable is just awful. I wish this whole service would be completely integrated with google store, so I don't have to manage two different app downloads. It's OK overall, but I still am on the fence on going back to chromecast.
author: ParalelCosmos
